column5: Has anyone experience with this lodge? (located in the Siouz Falls/Hudson area.) Is it an ok reputable place? Thanks. Daredevil

I have been there many times in the last 10 yrs. I think it is one of the best run camps in the province. It may not be the cheapest but accomodations, meals, and boats are top notch. They run about 90% repeat business. Good luck
THANKS ORCHARD FRANK. JUST TO MAKE SURE WE ARE TALKING ABOUT THE SAME PLACE IS THE LODGE YOU HAVE BEEN TO RUN BY JIM AND MARIENE HAYES? I HOPE IT IS. THANKS AGAIN. DAREDEVIL
I've been there three years running.......Yes it is Jim and Marlene.......great camp and facilities......can't wait for May 17th.

Yes, the Hayes camp is the one I am talking about. Lac Suel is big water.There is good fishing near camp, they will mark a map for you, but I would recommend booking a guide early on in your trip instead of waiting to the end. The guys there are good and you will have a great experience as well as shore lunch till it hurts.
